import{jwtDecode}from'jwt-decode';export const isAuthenticated=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('authToken');if(!token)return false;try{const decoded=jwtDecode(token);// ✅ use named import
return Date.now()<decoded.exp*1000;}catch{return false;}};export const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('authToken');localStorage.removeItem('userEmail');};
